incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Zamtel Network in Zambia

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to monitor the SMS service on Zamtel network in Zambia to ensure a full recovery, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Invalid Special Characters Rendering for Japanese Invoices

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue for invalid special characters rendering for Japanese invoices have been detected after multiple COMs received from some of our Japaneses customers, and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio's Messaging Services Feature is Undergoing a Routine Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
We’re conducting a planned maintenance in all countries between 11:00 PM and 12:00 AM Pacific Time on 12/14/2023. During the maintenance window, customers will see high latency and possible 5xx errors while trying to add/remove senders from a Messaging Service.

There will be no impact on any of the messages being sent via a messaging service.

Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 December 2023 at 08:00 PST until 15 December 2023 at 10:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls to and from a subset of Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 December 2023 at 00:00 PST until 18 December 2023 at 08:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match and Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 December 2023 at 13:00 PST until 18 December 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 19 December 2023 at 20:30 PST until 20 December 2023 at 01:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 10 January 2024 at 23:00 PST until 11 January 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following country and carrier: Bell Canada, Rogers Canada, Telus Canada
Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API], Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 December 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 December 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 04 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
06 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 06 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
11 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 11 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
13 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 13 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
18 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 18 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
20 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 20 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
25 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 25 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
27 December 2023 at 12:00 PDT until 27 December 2023 at 16:00 PDT
